page.title: 08ART COLLECTION
page.content: The Roseberys own a very impressive, priceless{art collection}much of which is on view at Dalmeny.The earliest family portrait is that of Sir Archibald Primrose and was painted by {John Scougal.}His son,the first Earl had his wife painted by{Godfrey {Kneller}but as his descendants lived mainly at Dalmeny,they tended to employ Edinburgh artists hence the large number of works by{Aikman, {Chambers}and{Ramsay.}The earliest portrait of the third Earl is by {Gainsborough.}The third Earl was also painted by{Nasmyth}and{Raeburn.}The fourth Earl extended the collection by purchasing portraits by{Van Dyke}and a group of paintings by the{Old Masters. By marrying Hannah de Rothschild,the fifth Earl futher extended the collection to include 16th century Italian and 18th century paintings./
